movie.title: The Vampires or, The Arch Criminals of Paris
movie.tagline: Every second exciting — every second thrilling — every episode sensational
movie.overview: Paris is prey to an invisible terror against which the police can do nothing: a sinister organization that sows chaos and death. The intrepid journalist Philippe Guérande and his partner embark on a long crusade to put an end to the crimes of the Great Vampire and Irma Vep, his dangerous accomplice. (A ten episode movie serial.)
